message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
I'll take a bit less, but still more than half
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. Take this deal before inflation eats all our profits!
Come on, meet me halfway before we both lose
Okay, Alice, let's stop this madness. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point. Take it before we both end up with peanuts!
